Author: ragingaquarius
Text: thank you! yeah, my sister and brother had to deal with the same, but it’s getting worse with age, and i’ve just learned to distract mysef until she gets a little more “lucid” every few months.

Author: XMuah
Text: I know it’s hard to think about... but especially because she knows you have bdd... there’s a possibility that she’s saying rude things on purpose. You’re going to get out of this situation, maybe not right now... and oh my gosh am I sorry that you’re going through this right now... but you’re going to make it out. Sending so much love your way.
